did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: This index lists the 170+ maps in the Marian Hunter History Room of the Avon Free Public Library. The maps cover the years 1625 until the early 2000's. The maps were created between 1829 to the early 2000's.
did.physloc: Marian Hunter History Room, Avon Free Public Library, 281 Country Club Rd., Avon, CT 06001

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research. Please contact the reference department at the Avon Free Public Library before visiting to ensure that staff is available and materials are ready. https://avonctlibrary.info/services/history-room

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Avon Free Public Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box no]., Avon Free Public Library

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: This index lists the 170+ maps in the Marian Hunter History Room of the Avon Free Public Library. The maps cover the years 1625 until the early 2000's. The maps were created between 1829 to the early 2000's. The collection was created by staff members from multiple donations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: This index lists the 170+ maps in the Marian Hunter History Room of the Avon Free Public Library. Each map is numbered; the number corresponds to the description listed in the index. Maps are shelved in the map cabinet in the Marian Hunter History Room unless otherwise indicated.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: Map 000, Surveyor's Map, 1881 is stored in the Archive Room due to its size.
